活動詳細內容
參加對象■僅限本系學生
活動名稱[CSIE] From Classroom to Competition/Company: Success Stories of Undergraduate Projects
活動地點Room C303, S.E. Building II, NDHU
報名日期時間2024/11/22(五) 00:00 ~ 2024/12/12(四) 10:00
活動日期時間2024/12/12(四) 13:00~14:00
活動說明
Want to take your undergraduate projects to new heights? Join Minh Trang and Samuel as they share their inspiring journeys—turning classroom ideas into competition successes and career opportunities. Get firsthand insights, tips, and motivation to elevate your own projects!

Here's why you won't want to miss it:
● Insider Tips: Get practical advice straight from Minh Trang and Samuel on how to transform your projects into something extraordinary.
● Real-World Stories: Hear about their journeys—the challenges, triumphs, and valuable lessons learned along the way.
● Career and Competition Inspiration: Spark your creativity and gain insights on how projects can open doors to exciting competitions and future paths.

Agenda:
● Introductions: Meet Minh Trang and Samuel.
● Minh Trang's Story: Turning a project into a competition entry.
● Samuel's Story: Leveraging a project for career opportunities.
● Q&A: Get answers and tips directly from Minh Trang and Samuel!
報名人數正取：60人
